淨淨RS
净净		浄pure, clean, unspoiled
  • dispute 爭/争 over clean water 氵 or ice 冫
heisig_constituent: clean, water, water droplets, water pistol, contend, bound up, rake
Keyword_KANJIDIC: clean, purify, cleanse, exorcise, Manchu Dynasty
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: чистые, очистите, чистит, заклинает, маньчжурская династия
koohiiStory1: Bottled water marketers contend to make their version of tap water sound the cleanest.
koohiiStory2: The water contends against the dirt in the ultimate battle for cleaninless.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Tsunami of conflict will cleanse and purify the lands of people, homes, and culture.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Anything less than a tsunami of conflict would leave something behind. But this much conflict will cleanse the area of everything.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: The cleanse of your lands was caused by Jourm (じょう). Why did the slow farmhand bring an army to the village, and why is he yelling about, "The cleanse," while destroying everything? Jourm?! Weren't we friends?
WaniKani_Reading_Info: You thought Jourm was an ordinary, clumsy, ten foot tall farmhand. But he brought down a tsunami upon your village. And, he brought armed conflict too. This thing he calls "The cleanse" was actually something he had been planning for years. His use of a totally ordinary Viking mouth towel... his table made of foreheads... That tatami mat altar with the forehead wearing a top hat... Was he really a Viking pretending to be a simple farmhand just so he could bring his men inland to cleanse and purify your village? It's too late now. Jourm stands over your body. You are about to receive "The cleanse" too.

浄字的基本解释

浄
jìng
同“净”。

浄字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jìng］
［《廣韻》疾政切，去勁，從。］
“淨1”的新字形。亦作“净1”。
(1)干净；清洁。亦用于形容抽象事物。
(2)指明净。
(3)洗净。
(4)净尽，无馀。
(5)指扫除净尽。
(6)指男子去掉生殖功能。
(7)纯，纯粹。
(8)用同“静”。宁静；寂静。
(9)副词。单，光。
(10)副词。全；都。
(11)佛教语。清静。
(12)指戒律。
(13)戏曲角色。俗称“花脸”、“花面”。扮演性格、品质或像貌上有特异之点的男性人物。如张飞、鲁智深、曹操、严嵩等。

浄字的康熙字典解释

浄字的起名意思

暂无。

net
Basic explanation of words
net
jìng
Same as "net".
net
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jìng］
["Guangyun" swiftly politically cut, go hard, follow. ]
The new glyph of "net 1". Also referred to as "net 1".
(1) Clean; clean. Also used to describe abstract things.
(2) Specify net.
(3) Wash.
(4) Net exhaustion, no excess.
(5) Refers to sweeping away.
(6) Refers to the removal of reproductive function in men.
(7) Pure, pure.
(8) Use the same "quiet". Quiet; silence.
(9) Adverbs. Single, light.
(10) Adverbs. all.
(11) Buddhist language. quiet.
(12) Refers to commandments.
(13) The role of opera. Commonly known as "flower face" and "flower face". Act as a male character with a peculiar character, quality or appearance. Such as Zhang Fei, Lu Zhishen, Cao Cao, Yan Song and so on.
net

Name meaning

jìng
яп. вм. 净
Radicals: 氵, 争  (tsunami, conflict)
Meaning Mnemonic
Tsunami of conflict will cleanse and purify the lands of people, homes, and culture.
Anything less than a tsunami of conflict would leave something behind. But this much conflict will cleanse the area of everything.
Reading Mnemonic
The cleanse of your lands was caused by Jourm (じょう). Why did the slow farmhand bring an army to the village, and why is he yelling about, "The cleanse," while destroying everything? Jourm?! Weren't we friends?
You thought Jourm was an ordinary, clumsy, ten foot tall farmhand. But he brought down a tsunami upon your village. And, he brought armed conflict too. This thing he calls "The cleanse" was actually something he had been planning for years. His use of a totally ordinary Viking mouth towel... his table made of foreheads... That tatami mat altar with the forehead wearing a top hat... Was he really a Viking pretending to be a simple farmhand just so he could bring his men inland to cleanse and purify your village? It's too late now. Jourm stands over your body. You are about to receive "The cleanse" too.
